backend/main.mo: Defines product, order, inquiry, site content, and user profile types with in-memory maps for storage and constants for media and cancellation windows.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature definitions, related components, files, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing functionality for pages, components, hooks, and admin tools.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and dark-mode variants defining global colors, radii, and component tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, authentication profile checks, and renders the main layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Admin interface to upload, reorder, enable/disable, and update carousel slides with image uploads.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryMan: Admin tool to view customer inquiries and send responses using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin interface to view orders, update their status, and print formatted order details.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal form for creating or editing products, including media upload and preview handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Displays product inventory with options to add, edit, or delete products using a modal and confirmations.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Form-based interface for editing and saving site-wide content such as contact info and policies.
frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSys: Footer component showing branding, contact info, policy links, and optional custom footer text.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: Interactive auto-rotating homepage carousel that filters enabled slides, supports manual navigation, and links slides via URL redirects.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Transparent global layout header with scroll-compress behavior, branding assets, auth controls, cart badge, and footer rendering.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailModal: Displays detailed order information, status, and cancellation flow with reason selection and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/ProductMediaCaro: Shows product media as a carousel supporting video and images with navigation arrows and dots.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and saving user profile details and invalidating related queries after submission.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Empty placeholder component file for Stripe setup modal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store for cart items with persist support, providing add, remove, update, and totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useFooterVariant.ts: Simple hook returning a constant footer variant of 'split'.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, orders, inquiries, carousel slides, and user/admin data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base plus extensive custom CSS variables defining a luxury-themed color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard showing stats and management tabs for products, orders, inquiries, site content, and carousel.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Cart page showing items, quantities, pricing, and requiring login before viewing or checking out.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements a two-step checkout flow with address entry, UPI payment, and order creation for each cart item.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides an authenticated contact form allowing users to submit inquiries to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboardPage: Displays authenticated users’ orders and inquiries with status info and order detail modal support.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Fetches and displays products with add-to-cart and buy-now actions, plus a homepage carousel.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info, media carousel, and lets authenticated users add to cart or proceed to checkout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash for sensitive token handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s versioned state, feature list, and summaries of implemented functionality for the ICP e‑commerce app.
